chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
s: seq R

Goal:
Rlength (seq2Rlist s) = size s

Premises:
Notation seq := list
seq2Rlist = fix seq2Rlist (s : seq R) : Rlist := match s with | [::] => nil | h :: t => cons h (seq2Rlist t) end : seq R -> Rlist Argument scope is [seq_scope]
Rlength = fix Rlength (l : Rlist) : nat := match l with | nil => 0%nat | cons _ l' => S (Rlength l') end : Rlist -> nat
size = fun T : Type => fix size (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0%nat | _ :: s' => S (size s') end : forall T : Type, seq T -> nat Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
Rlist2seq_bij : forall s : seq R, Rlist2seq (seq2Rlist s) = s
size_take : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (take n0 s) = (if ssrnat.leq (S n0) (size s) then n0 else size s)
size_mask : forall (T : Type) (m : bitseq) (s : seq T), size m = size s -> size (mask m s) = count (fun x : bool => x) m
size_takel : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq n0 (size s) -> size (take n0 s) = n0
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)
subseqP : reflect (exists2 m : seq bool, size m = size ?s2 & ?s1 = mask m ?s2) (subseq ?s1 ?s2) where ?T : [s : seq R |- eqtype.Equality.type] ?s1 : [s : seq R |- seq (eqtype.Equality.sort ?T)] ?s2 : [s : seq R |- seq (eqtype.Equality.sort ?T)]
seq_ind2 : forall P : seq ?S -> seq ?T -> Type, P [::] [::] -> (forall (x : ?S) (y : ?T) (s0 : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s0 = size t -> P s0 t -> P (x :: s0) (y :: t)) -> forall (s0 : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s0 = size t -> P s0 t where ?S : [s : seq R |- Type] ?T : [s : seq R |- Type]
RList_P18 : forall (l : Rlist) (f : R -> R), Rlength (app_Rlist l f) = Rlength l
size_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), size [seq f i | i <- s] = size s
mask_cat : forall (T : Type) (m1 m2 : bitseq) (s1 s2 : seq T), size m1 = size s1 -> mask (m1 ++ m2) (s1 ++ s2) = mask m1 s1 ++ mask m2 s2
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
index_mem : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), ssrnat.leq (S (index x s)) (size s) = (x \in s)
StepFun_P20 : forall (l : Rlist) (f : R -> R), (0 < Rlength l)%nat -> Rlength l = S (Rlength (FF l f))
all_pred1P : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), reflect (s = nseq (size s) x) (all (pred_of_simpl (T:=eqtype.Equality.sort T) (eqtype.pred1 x)) s)
Rlist_P1 : forall (l : Rlist) (P : R -> R -> Prop), (forall x : R, In x l -> exists y : R, P x y) -> exists l' : Rlist, Rlength l = Rlength l' /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Rlength l)%nat -> P (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l' i))
RList_P14 : forall (l : Rlist) (a : R), Rlength (mid_Rlist l a) = Rlength l
take_oversize : forall (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) n -> take n s = s
RList_P11 : forall l1 l2 : Rlist, Rlength (cons_ORlist l1 l2) = (Rlength l1 + Rlength l2)%nat
RList_P23 : forall l1 l2 : Rlist, Rlength (cons_Rlist l1 l2) = (Rlength l1 + Rlength l2)%nat
size_iota : forall m n : nat, size (seq.iota m n) = n
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
interval_finite_subdiv : forall (a b : R) (eps : posreal), a <= b -> {l : seq R | head 0 l = a /\ last 0 l = b /\ (forall i : nat, (S i < size l)%nat -> nth 0 l i < nth 0 l (S i) <= nth 0 l i + eps)}
nth_index : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x0 x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), x \in s -> nth x0 s (index x s) = x
seq2Rlist_bij : forall s : Rlist, seq2Rlist (Rlist2seq s) = s
last_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), last (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (last x s)

```coq
induction s using seq_ind2.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite IHs. auto.
Qed.

original: induction s using seq_ind2. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite IHs. auto.
